title: Echoes of Summer
description: "In his recent move back home, Max will be faced with some tough decisions, and even tougher challenges. When the return of old friends means the return of old enemies, Max is forced to choose between his own safety, and his relationship with Leo. While dealing with the problems of this, he also realises that some of his problems are a little closer to home, and is forced to confront his friends.The final installment of the Amnesia Trilogy is guaranteed to induce emotional responses among fans.Included in this A letter from the author, and other special additions.
author: S.J. Littlewood
